revised_title: Magne-crystallic Action in Paramagnetic Salts of Rare Earth and Iron Groups
tldr: The authors conducted magnetic measurements on various paramagnetic crystals, including rare earth salts and iron group elements. They discussed the magnetic anisotropy and temperature variation of susceptibility in these crystals, providing experimental support for the theory developed by Van Vleck, Penney, and Schlapp. The study focused on the crystal fields and their effects on the magnetic properties of the crystals.
